clues.text: Steven Spielberg named the mechanical shark in this 1975 classic "Bruce" after his lawyer

rounds.comments: (Alex: To help you, the correct response will be a word that is found within one of the words in the clue.)

rounds.text: A judge's directed verdict of guilty for her action in Rochester in 1872 was written before her trial began
